text: Berthold is a city in Ward County, North Dakota, United States. Its population was 490 in 2020. It is part of the Minot Micropolitan Statistical Area. Berthold was founded in 1900. == Geography == Berthold is at the coordinates of (48.316025, -101.735776). The city is of land. == Education == Berthold is in the Lewis and Clark School District. \- Berthold is on page 17 (PDF p. 18/39). That district was formed in 2003 when the Berthold School District merged with two other school districts. \- Clipping from Newspapers.com. In Berthold, the only school is Berthold Public School. == References == Category:Cities in North Dakota
title: Berthold, North Dakota
